member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the TCPClientActivex class.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.isConnected
member.summary: Client is connected to a listening host.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.isCameraOn
member.summary: Camera is connected to a preview window.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.isRecording
member.summary: Client is recording a preview.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.VideoSourceIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets camera source by index.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.PreviewFPS
member.summary: Gets or sets the framerate for the preview window.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.CaptureFPS
member.summary: Gets or sets the framerate used when recording video.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.RequireOKToCapture
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether the user is prompted before recording video.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.SpawnCaptureInNewThread
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether recording will be spawned in a new process.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.AVIBlockSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines the block size in bytes of the recorded avi file. 0 (default) sets to current sector size.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.MaxFramesToCapture
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines the maximum frames to record.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.CaptureAudio
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether audio will be recorded with video.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.CapturePathAndFileName
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines where recorded file is saved.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.AlwaysOverwrite
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether or not to display a confirmation to overwrite.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connects client to listening host.
member.param: The IP Address of the host to connect to.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.Client_Connected
member.summary: Raised when client is connected to host.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.Client_Disconnected
member.summary: Raised when client is disconnected from host.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.StartCamera
member.summary: Start camera and initiate preview.

member.summary: Start recording the preview window.

member.summary: Stop recording the preview window.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.StopCamera
member.summary: Stop camera and disable preview.

member.summary: Show the camera settings dialog.

member.summary: Show the compression settings dialog.

member.name: M:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.Disconnect
member.summary: Disconnect the client from the host.

member.summary: Start listening for clients.

member.summary: Stop listening for clients.

member.summary: Queries the host to see if it's listening.

member.summary: Returns a single image of the current picturebox frame.

member.summary: Gets or sets the send buffer in the tcp stack.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.ReceiveBufferSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the receive buffer in the tcp stack.

member.name: P:TCPCamActivex.TCPClientActivex.NoDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that determines whether there is a delay before the next packet is transmitted if an acknowledgement hasn't been received.
